text: Charles Paul Dewachtere (22 December 1927 - 22 July 2020) was a Belgian long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1952 Summer Olympics. In 1951 he became Belgian champion in a race over 35 km, between Waregem and Ghent. He was born in Ghent, Belgium.Klooster Peter, Abebe Bikila en 20 andere mooie verhalen uit 20 jaar Runner's World, 15. title: Charles Dewachtere
